actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to remove certain civil service positions in the Drug Enforcement Administration from the competitive service.

summary.text: Exempts specified civil service positions in the Drug Enforcement Administration from the competitive service and sets forth regulations with respect to the transfer of incumbents in such positions.

titles.title: A bill to remove certain civil service positions in the Drug Enforcement Administration from the competitive service.
